text: @MattHancock @DominicRaab Really? This drug may have been just “proven” to improve chances of survival for Covid19 patients thank goodness to all NHS and patients for clinical trials. However this drug is so old on the market it precedes my NHS service don’t pretend this government has stockpiled for use
